name: get_associations_to
description: Returns list of matching associations pointing to a given object (target)

evidence.description: Object id, e.g. ECO:0000501 (for IEA; Includes inferred by default) or a specific publication or other supporting object, e.g. ZFIN:ZDB-PUB-060503-2

unselect_evidence.description: If true, excludes evidence objects in response

exclude_automatic_assertions.description: If true, excludes associations that involve IEAs (ECO:0000501)

use_compact_associations.description: If true, returns results in compact associations format

object.description: Return associations pointing to this node, e.g. specifying MP:0013765 will return all genes, variants, strains, etc. annotated with this term. Can also be a biological entity such as a gene

$ul: **facet_counts**: Mapping between field names and association counts
**highlighting**: Mapping between id and solr highlight
**numFound**: total number of associations matching query
**associations**: Complete representation of full association object, plus evidence
**compact_associations**: Compact representation in which objects (e.g. phenotypes) are collected for subject-predicate pairs
